title: My first post: Learning goals for 2021
description: pRactice corner for coding in R
contents:
Hi, this is my practice corner for coding in R. I would want to:
learn tidyverse
practice on data visualization, exploration.
learn tidymodels/machine learning
learn Design of Experiment
learn Chemometrics
learn how to analyse sensory data
be able to communicate insights from data analysis using the Rmarkdown/distill packages
